name: Movavi Video Project
summary: A MEP file is a video project created by Movavi Video Editor (version 10 and earlier) and Movavi Video Suite (version 14 and earlier). It contains imported video, images, transitions, effects, and project settings. MEP files were replaced by .MEPX files with the release of version 11 of Movavi Video Editor and version 15 of Movavi Video Suite.
